Posts.Title: Monday's Biopsy Results

Posts.Content: Oh, I am so sorry to hear this. I am playing devil's advocate, but it doesn't sound like he has done anything, yet. He is probably feeling VERY scared and powerless. Hard feelings for men. If you love him and he is worth it, talk to him. Tell him WHATEVER he is feeling is OKAY. Tell him you love him. Thinking of you, V
